docs.text: 结合Typora使用 ¶ For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands ¶ mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout ¶ mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: 结合Typora使用

docs.text: How to set Python3 as a default python version on Mac? - DEV Community 👩‍💻👨‍💻 介绍了如何更换Mac终端的Python版本 https://www.mkdocs.org/#installing-pip 更换终端的Python版本后如何更换pip到相应版本目录下 github.io 托管网站必须是 public repository 才行，private 得交钱
